it's not working on my benq drive for some reason... any suggestions?
@brstarks my drive is benq and i had no problems with my flash, used x360usb pro and latest jungleflasher

which firmware do i use? when i load the LTPlus-benq-v2.0 one i get a no firmware added code on jf and when i install the LT-Benq-0800-v3 i get a xbox screen every time i put in a xbox game! please help! i want to play mw3 when it comes out asap!

the benq 800 v3 is only for a stand alone drive if you want to rip games from the original source not to be used in a 360 the Ltplus benq v2.0 is the one you want you may want to try this
1.flash back to stock
2.reconnect your drive n update your dashboard to 13599 i used usb drive
3.the hook back up to your pc and flash to the benq v2.0.

and then that should be you also use the lastest gear jungleflasher 1.88 and with imgburn remember to follow the new instuctions for burning xgd3 games.
you da man! i got it! turned out i cant put the firmware on using jf 1.77 beta. upgraded to 1.87 and it worked out smoothly! soooo sooo soooo excited!!! thanks everyone who made this possible!
You rock men im so excited to check it out!!!! 10000000000000000000 Thnks
